models

Class NatMemoryNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.NatMemoryNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicalComponent

    public class NatMemoryNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphicalComponent
    Plasticity from the Nature paper "Diverse synaptic plasticity mechanisms orchestrated to form and retrieve memories in spiking neural networks" Has 4: STP, STDP, heterosynaptic plasticity and transmitter-induced plasticity.
    Author:
    lana

                        boolean draw)
        Parameters:
        name - name for logging

      • NatMemoryNetwork

        public NatMemoryNetwork(int nn,
                        int ni,
                        double wr,
                        double maxw,
                        double nr,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        boolean draw)
        Parameters:
        nn - total number of neurons
        ni - number of inhibitory neurons
        wr - weights range
        maxw - max weight
        nr - noise range
        name - use if running parallel experiments; set to "" if no name necessary
        draw - set true if graphics are necessary (slow)
